lines.text: let n , max , save be long integers
lines.code: long long int n , max , save ;

lines.text: for max is equal to 0 , 2 * ( max * max ) is less than n * n , increment max by 1 , save is equal to max
lines.code: for ( max = 0 ; 2 * ( max * max ) < n * n ; max ++ ) { save = max ; }

lines.text: if ( save + 1 ) * ( save + 1 ) + save * save < = n * n
lines.code: if ( ( save + 1 ) * ( save + 1 ) + save * save <= n * n )
